quotes: at the Sundance Film Festival on January 25, 2025. It received acclaim from critics.
In May 2025, she joined Greta Gerwig's The Chronicles of Narnia film adaptation, which is titled Narnia: The Magician's Nephew and based on the series' sixth novel.
Mulligan dated Shia LaBeouf, with whom she co-starred in the film Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps, from 2009 to 2010.
In 2012, she married Marcus Mumford, the lead singer of Mumford & Sons.
A few weeks after completing production on the film Inside Llewyn Davis, in which they were both involved, they married on 21 April 2012.
In 2014, Mulligan became an ambassador for the charity War Child and visited the Democratic Republic of Congo in this role.

quotes: She will have a voice role in Laika's stop motion animated feature Wildwood, based on the fantasy novel of the same name.

quotes: Mulligan will also star on the second season of Netflix's anthology series Beef, alongside Oscar Isaac, Cailee Spaeny, Charles Melton.

organizations.name: Safe Project
quotes: Aside from acting, Mulligan was among the actresses who took part in the Safe Project—each was photographed in the place she feels safest—for a 2010 series to raise awareness of sex trafficking.

organizations.name: Alzheimer's Society
quotes: Mulligan became the ambassador of the Alzheimer's Society in 2012, with the goal of raising awareness and research funding for Alzheimers and dementia.

In 2014, Mulligan became an ambassador for the charity War Child and visited the Democratic Republic of Congo in this role.
She helped host and participated in the 2012 Alzheimer's Society Memory Walk and was one of the sponsored Alzheimer's Society runners in the 2013 Nike Run to the Beat half-marathon in London.
